effect.diamond-pearl: Inflicts regular damage. For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn. The user continues to use other moves during this time. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn. The user continues to use other moves during this time. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.
effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. For the next 2–5 turns, the target cannot leave the field and is damaged for 1/16 its max HP at the end of each turn. The user continues to use other moves during this time. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends. Has a 3/8 chance each to hit 2 or 3 times, and a 1/8 chance each to hit 4 or 5 times. Averages to 3 hits per use. If the target is in the first turn of dive, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.diamond-pearl: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.
short_effect.platinum: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.
short_effect.heartgold-soulsilver: Prevents the target from leaving battle and inflicts 1/16 its max HP in damage for 2-5 turns.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user traps the foe inside a fast, vicious whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns.
flavor_text.platinum: The user traps the foe inside a fast, vicious whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Traps the foe inside a whirlpool that lasts for two to five turns. The user can pass through whirlpools.
